    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5010</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sword Project</string>
            <string language="es">Proyecto de la espada</string>
            <string language="ga">Tionscadal Claímh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klinge-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet D'Épée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Da Espada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Della Spada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα ξιφών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Drawings for creating a small aword using the cross halving joint and chamfering.</string>
            <string language="es">Dibujos para crear una pequeña espada utilizando dos mitades de una barra y una barra para hacer una cruz</string>
            <string language="ga">Líníochtaí chun claíomh beag a dhéanamh trí úsáid a bhaint as  an leathalt crosach agus seaimféaráil.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Materials Technology Wood</string>
            <string language="es">Materiales. Tecnología. Madera. Proyecto</string>
            <string language="ga">Teicneolaíocht Ábhar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Project</string>
            <string language="ga">Adhmad</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnungen für das Erstellen eines kleinen 
aword mit der halbierenden Kreuzverbindung und das Abschrägen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schémas pour créer un petit aword en utilisant 
le joint se réduisant de moitié en travers et le chamfreinage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhos para criar um aword pequeno usando a 
junção halving transversal e chanfrá-lo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Illustrazioni per la creazione del aword piccolo 
usando il giunto dimezzante trasversale e smussare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδια για τη δημιουργία ενός μικρού aword που 
χρησιμοποιεί τη διαγώνια διχοτόμηση κοινή και να κάνει λοξοτομή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Material-Technologie-Holz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Projekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bois de Technologie de Matériaux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα</string>
          </keyword>
